scripts.clean: rm -rf web/packages/*/dist web/apps/*/dist web/crates/*/target web/crates/*/pkg node_modules/.vite
scripts.setup: pnpm install && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && pnpm build:wasm
scripts.quick: pnpm install && pnpm build:wasm && pnpm dev:playground
scripts.status: echo 'Project Status:' && node --version && pnpm --version && rustc --version && echo 'WASM target:' && rustup target list | grep wasm32-unknown-unknown | grep installed || echo 'Not installed'
scripts.ports: echo 'Checking ports...' && lsof -ti:5175 2>/dev/null && echo 'Port 5175 in use' || echo 'Port 5175 available' && lsof -ti:5176 2>/dev/null && echo 'Port 5176 in use' || echo 'Port 5176 available'
